about_the_game:
Everything was good for you until you found that phone and a demon started talking in your head... after that everything was different... WAY BETTER !

Secret Kinks is a DATING SIMS which focus on the best of adult content: KINKS !

Nothing is casual, everything will be spicy, hot, without limits!

Prepare yourself to answer the most naughty and exotic requests of the women in the city!

Thanks to this demon and the phone he gave you!

But all this fun comes with a cost... it will not be free for you or those women...

  • More than 50 women to satisfy and "collect".

  • More than 50 different kinks to experience.

  • A complexe story to unveil with clues to reveal here and there along the story. Who is this demon? How does the phone work exactly? So many questions to answer.

  • Optional: Items to find to unlock special rewards like alternative pictures.

  • A real gameplay based on placement and timing.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages and topics not suited for sensitive audience, such as:
- Female and Male Nudity
- Various animated Sex scenes (including anal, blowjob, titsjob, groups, feetjob, public, domination, toys, handcuff, cosplay)
- Very sexually explicit dialogues
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
